Name: Punch & Judy
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lime wheel & dust with grated nutmeg.
Review: A veritable fruit bowl and spirits rail of a punch in a glass.
History: Adapted from the official cocktail of the 2008 Tales of the Cocktail created by Charlotte Voisey, USA. Punch history
